snippet: An 8-year-old boy died after he was run over by a float driven by his father at the end of a Fourth of July parade in central Oklahoma.
lead_paragraph: An 8-year-old boy died after he was run over by a float driven by his father at the end of a Fourth of July parade in central Oklahoma.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Boy Is Killed by Parade Float
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Boy Killed By Parade Float
